revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Token | name = Strife slideshow starter | class = SlideshowStarter | game = Strife | convid = 343 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:DummyStrifeItem|DummyStrifeItem]]→SlideshowStarter
This is a dummy actor that is used in ''[[Strife]]'' to start slideshows within a level. It is only used in {{dw|MAP03: Front Base (Strife)|MAP03}} and {{dw|MAP10: New Front Base (Strife)|MAP10}} of said game, where it is given away by {{class|Macil1|Macil}} during his conversations. After that has happened, the item is instantly removed from the inventory. Custom slideshows are created in the same fashion as [[Intermission definition|custom intermissions]], but have to be specified for a level in [[MAPINFO]] by using the {{c|slideshow}} keyword. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SlideshowStarter : {{Class|DummyStrifeItem}} native {}
